original_text: ‘Go in through the narrow gate to get true life with God. There is a wide gate that is easy to go through. The wide path is easy to travel on. Many people find that wide gate, but it is the way to hell.
korean_text: 좁은 문으로 들어가라 멸망으로 인도하는 문은 크고 그 길이 넓어 그리로 들어가는 자가 많고

sentences.original_text: Go in through the narrow gate
to get true life with God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님과 함께 참된 생명을 얻기 위해

sentences.original_text: that is easy to go through
The wide path is easy to travel on
Many people find that wide gate
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 사람들이 그 넓은 문을 찾는다

sentences.original_text: but it is the way to hell
